title: Amazon Share Price Surges Premarket Following Bumper Earnings
sub_head: Tech stocks diverge this earnings season as investors subject results to greater scrutiny
body:
Amazon . com Inc. shares jumped in premarket trading after the e-commerce company relieved investors with a near doubling in profit in the holiday period, highlighting the divergence in fortunes among giant tech stocks.
Amazonâ€™s 13% advance ahead of the opening bell Friday comes at the end of a dizzying week for technology stocks that has sent shudders through the broader market. Meta Platforms Inc . , previously known as Facebook, plunged 26% on Thursday in its biggest one-day decline since going public in 2012. It edged up 0.9% in premarket trading Friday.
